name: Vaibhav Khandelwal
bio: Vaibhav spearheads our AI engineering efforts, designing and building robust, scalable AI solutions. With deep expertise in machine learning and cloud platforms, he turns complex AI challenges into impactful realities.

name: Ayush Mangal
bio: Ayush is a specialist in developing advanced machine learning models and NLP solutions. He is passionate about leveraging data to uncover insights and drive intelligent automation for our clients.

name: Snehal Raj
bio: Snehal bridges the gap between AI capabilities and business strategy. He works closely with clients to identify AI opportunities, define product roadmaps, and ensure solutions deliver tangible business value.
